description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Jamaican Pork Jerk recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pulled pork burger,High fibre,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Pork
name: Spiced Jamaican Pork Jerk Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped
2 lime, juiced (save 2 tbs lime juice for later)

recipeInstructions.text: For marinade, combine all ingredients in a large glass dish. Add pork and massage with marinade. Cover and marinate overnight in the fridge.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place pork on a rack in a roasting pan. Add 2cm water to the bottom of the pan. Cover pan with foil and bake for 2 hours.
Transfer to a chopping board. Using 2 forks, shred meat and place in a bowl. Add 1/4 cup pan juices and toss.

Heat a chargrill over high heat. Add pineapple and cook for 2 minutes each side or until charred. Finely chop and place into a bowl. Add chilli, coconut and lime juice. Season with salt and white pepper. Toss to combine.
Spread rolls with mayonnaise, then add coriander leaves. Top with pork and pineapple salsa. Serve.
